title: 3D Snake
description: A 3D version of the classic Snake game built with React and Three.js. Also implemented an AI using pathfinding algorithms.

title: k-Means Visualizer
description: Graphs iterations of the k-means clustering algorithm when applied to the problem of determining a k-color palette representative of a provided image.

title: Find Your Zen
description: A mindfulness app including daily checkins, breathing exercises, and meditation timers. Built to practice iOS development and design.

title: Musical Heap
description: A min-heap that displays intermediate steps and plays musical notes during insert and remove operations.

title: Personal Website
description: This is the personal website that I built to share a bit about myself on the Internet and store other projects that I create.

title: Pathfinding Visualizer
description: A visualization tool for pathfinding algorithms. Currently implements breadth-first search.
